runs.comm: short of a length, outside off stump and Smith blocks it, India make a superb start to Pro20, a dot ball!
and Smith tucks it off his hips for his first run of the series, he'll be a relieved man, Zaheer hasn't found the swing into the left-hander in his first two balls
pitches outside off and moves wider from Loots Bosman, that's too wide
identical ball, but a touch closer to the batsman and this time it's a legal ball
the ball whirrs past the outside edge, that pitched on off and moved a shade away, Bosman drove at it and was beaten
and again, moving across the right-hander from over the wicket, Bosman wafts and misses
played to point, loud calls of "No!" from the batsman, Zaheer starts superbly conceding just 2 off the first over
not your typical Pro20 pitch this, that pitched on Smith's off stump and moved away from the left-hander, Smith played and missed
and this one pitches outside off, Smith lets it go and after it passes him it moves back towards Dhoni
whoops, Sreesanth did a Harmison! That was so wide that it went between first and second slip for four wides, the pressure's off South Africa
dropped short and wide, Smith crashes that through covers for the first boundary off the bat
driven to mid-on off the front foot
poor ball, too full from Sreesanth and Smith plays a delightful straight drive past mid-off for four, his regaining his touch
driven slightly uppishly to cover
dabbed to point for a sharp single, Kaif screams in, picks up and shies at the non-striker's end but misses
short of a length outside off stump, Smith moves across and drops it short of midwicket for a single
fuller in length and outside off, Bosman throws everything behind it and slashes it to third man
angling into Smith's middle and leg stump from over the wicket, defended on the leg side on the back foot
again Zaheer keeps it outside off, once again Smith walks across his stumps and works it off his pads to fine leg
Bosman goes, tame edge to Tendulkar at first slip, Zaheer kept it full outside off, taking the ball away from the right hander, Bosman drove at it and only managed to get the edge
full and wide outside off, Smith lets that go
whoops, that had Smith in a tangle, the seam was upright, it pitched outside off, Smith moved across again and the ball beat the outside edge
and again, how close was that to the outside edge, Smith drives again outside off and the away movement beats him
another big big wide outside off, Sreesanth just needs to keep his cool here, he's beaten Smith with consecutive balls, he doesn't want to release the pressure with wides
much straighter and short of a length, Smith defends on the back foot
whack, what a shot that was, premeditated perhaps, for Smith was down the track in a trice and bashed Sreesanth's short-of-a-length ball over mid-off
fuller ball on the pads, Smith whips it to mid-on
Gibbs gets a ripper first up, Zaheer pitches that on a perfect length and moves it away from the right-hander. Gibbs gets squared up and the ball zips past the edge
a touch shorter outside off, Gibbs gets forward and defends to point
loud appeal for lbw, Zaheer thought he had a good case - as all bowlers do - but that pitched outside leg and was too high

it's mayhem out there, Gibbs drives to cover, Mongia dives superbly to stop it, Karthik picks up the ball, Smith is in big trouble running towards the striker's end, Karthik shies, he misses and concedes overthrows
a touch short, not that short mind you and Gibbs short-arm pulls it over midwicket for four
he strikes first ball, perhaps a trifle lucky because it was very wide and was moving wider away from Gibbs who plonked his front foot down and bashed it straight at Raina at cover
left alone outside off
in the channel outside off and Kemp lets it go again
a shade straighter and on a good length, Kemp moves forward and defends
that pitched short of a length and cut back very sharply into Kemp, that ball hit him high on the thigh
tight line, tight length, defended on the leg side, Agarkar starts with a maiden wicket in Pro20
short of a length outside off, defended on the front foot
that's a shocking wide from Zaheer
angling into Smith from over the wicket, worked of the pads behind square
pitches on off stump and moves away from the right-hander, Kemp lets it go
punched through cover
full and straight, Smith tries to charge and whack it down the ground but gets inside edge to midwicket

and Zaheer underlines the fact that Smith is his bunny. Full ball angling into the left-hander, Smith moves a shade across and gets hit on the back pad plumb in front, that's four out of four for Zaheer against Smith
defended to point on the back foot
short of a length on middle and leg, tucked off the pads on the leg side
short and wide outside off, de Villiers slashes at it but doesn't make contact
take that! Agarkar dishes up a short and wie ball, AB de Villiers frees his arms and slaps that over third man, super six
that bounced on de Villiers just outside of stump, he lets it go
got him, Agarkar has two in two overs. He serves that full and swinging away from the right-hander, de Villiers drives ahrd at it, gets the edge and Dhoni  takes a low catch
poor start, short and wide, bashed through cover for four
straighter ball on midle stump, defended on the leg side
short ball, Kemp tries to pull and gloves it over Dhoni for four more, More dancing in the stands, more music and much fun
good length ball outside off, defended on the off side
fuller ball, swingign back into the right hander, Kemp plays forward and gets an inside edge on to the pad
superb bowling, this one pitches on the ideal length adn shapes away from Kemp who gets squared up and beaten
an appeal for lbw is turned down, that pitched outside leg and hit Morkel on the pad
played through cover point for a single, South Africa bring up their fifty at less than 6 runs per over

short of a length outside off, Kemp majestically stands up tall and punches through cover, the ball races to the fence and quicksilver Karthik dives superbly on the fence to save the four, he has a little trouble in spottign the ball after he saved it but a superb efort nevertheless
short and drifting down leg side, Kemp works it past square leg to the fence, easy pickings
straighter line and better length, worked on the leg side for one
fired in outside the off, Morkel slashes and misses
full outside off stump, moving away, Kemp has an almighty heave and fails to male contact
full on the stumps, Kemp comes forward and drives past Pathan's outstretched left hand and picks up two down the ground
fullish on off stump, Kemp comes forward and ends up defending, well bowled
short this time, Kemp quickly swivels and pulls out to Tendulkar on the deep midwicket, who fumbles the take
short and wide, some movement into him, but he stands and steers that down to Sreesanth at third man for the single
full and swinging into leg stump, Kemp flicks that down to Sreesanth at deep fine leg and retains the strike
short outside off stump, carved through the off side to Kaif on the deep cover ropes
slower ball, teasingly on the stumps and Morkel defends back to Tendulkar
quicker on middle and off, pushed to point, no run however
wobbles this one on off stump, this time Morkel picks up one in front of point
gone! Sends this one down straight on the stumps, no real movement and Kemp is caught on the pad in front of middle and leg, Tendulkar appeals and umpire Jerling agrees!
spins this one quicker outside off stump, van der Wath has a flirt but cant make contact, good over from Tendulkar
full outside off stump, driven to Zaheer at mid-off and sets off, van der Wath was ball-watching and doesnt respond, they miss out on an easy single
full on leg stump, he swings and misses, ball hits the leg
full outside off stump, Morkel has a good old agricultural heave across the line and times that in the gap at midwicket and picks up four, a welcome one
oh ho! Dropped in short, Morkel simply flat-bats that over mid-wicket for maximum
short outside off stump, and its chopped into the covers for one
full and swinging away outside off stump, he drives airily and gets a thick outside edge down to third man
full in the zone, a yorker, well bowled and well dug out
short and moving into him outside off stump, batsman swings across the line but connects with the chilly air, thats it, a dot ball!
and again, short and moving into him, he swings at it but gets hit on the chest...ouch...
and again, swings, misses, gets one on the chest, but he picks up a run as the ball rolls to point
short and slightly wide, crunched to point and thats well stopped
huge! Too short, too wide, and Morkel hops in the air and uppercuts that fiercly over the point fence, crowd goes berzerk! What a hit!
tossed up on the stumps, defended to cover
quicker and flatter on middle and off, Morkel tries a chop but the ball misses and squirts between bat and the stumps for one to backward square leg
tossed up outside off, chopped into the covers
SMOKED! Tossed up on off stump, too much flight, and Morkel slog-sweeps that with some power over wide long-on, thats massive, two or three tiers back in the stands
tossed up on the stumps, driven down to long-on
flatter and quicker, in the blockhole, dug out to the on side
full outside off stump, easy pickings, van der Wath tees off and smacks that over mid-off for four, shot!
madness! Pitches this one shorter outside off stump, he heaves at that but doesnt get under it, the ball pops up and lands between two fielders at wide long-on, where are the men?
short and its pulled past square leg for one
got 'em! Fullish outside off stump, Morkel launches into the lofted drive down the ground, didnt lean into it enough though, and can only find the eager fielder down at long-off
good length ball on the stumps, he whips that to mid-wicket
full on middle and leg, easily whipped through mid-wicket for a couple
flat and spinning in from outside off stump, steered to point
flatter on middle and leg, flicked into midwicket for one
flat and quick on the stumps, thumped over Harbhajan to the man at long-off
tossed up, Peterson charges and slogs, gets in inside edge into the ground
tossed up outside off stump, driven to Sreesanth at backward point, who lets the ball through his legs and they get two, bad fielding
tossed up again, and its driven into the covers
well bowled! Full in the blockhole, dug out back to Pathan, useful stuff
short and wide, quick ball that swings back into him but he's backed away too far and misses out on the flashy uppercut, a dot ball
full outside off stump, driven down to Tendulkar at long-off, a run, finally!
full outside off stump, driven out to Kaif on the deep extra cover ropes, ones coming now, but no fours
a yorker again, and Peterson slogs that across the line to mid-on, well bowled, Pathan
lands on a good length outside off stump, van der Wath swings that across the line and down to wide long-on for two
tossed up outside off stump, quicker, smashed down to long-off
quicker in the blockhole, no room to drive, van der Wath backs away and squeezes that past point
tossed up on off stump, slogged down to long-on for one
a full toss, van der Wath charges and slams that over mid-on, and Raina makes a good stop on the ropes
he oversteps! Was a good ball, cramped him for room, flicked to backward square leg, a free hit coming up

madness! Flat outside off stump, and he slogs the free hit down to the man at long-on, who takes the catch, but Peterson's lost his marbles, and begins to walk away, thinking he was out, and the throw that comes back to Harbhajan is whipped off with the bails, and Peterson has to go...oh ho!
gone! Tossed up outside off stump, and its slogged down Raina's throat at long-on, Harbhajan gets him! Thats two in two for India...
flat on the stumps, slogged to mid-wicket
full in the zone, slogged down to fine leg with the inside edge
well bowled, slower into the legs, and he cant time the flick
tossed up on off stump, worked to backward point where the throw comes in a flash, Dhoni whips off the stumps and he's gone!
lands just outside off stump, he walks across the stumps and gets rapped on the pads, not out says the umpire
tossed up, slammed down to long-off and they run hard, two is always on the cards and the throw is off, and thats the end of South Africa's innings
